channel.title: 2 standard problems - plox help
channel.description:
Hi! i got these 2 problems,
firstly i can't find the GUI.java in teh client so i can change the name of the client.
Secondly i always hit 0's on the other players.
i know it's in combatassistant but what exactly to search?
pi 317
- matt

item.title: 2 standard problems - plox help
item.dc:creator: @random_dude4 random dude4
item.description:
@random_dude4 wrote:

CZAR, do you have msn or skype? would really be appriciated, look your pm

Read full topic

item.title: 2 standard problems - plox help
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

First PI is only 317 deob, and If you do not have a bin folder find the folder with all the .class files not the .java files.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 standard problems - plox help
item.dc:creator: @random_dude4 random dude4
item.description:
@random_dude4 wrote:

1 problem, there’s no BIN in my client.

  • while thinking over it i do not think it’s a 317 PI. all i know atm is that it’s a pi…
    So there’s no bin. Client\ cache or sign - Cache \ Data \ animation / raw / sprites.

So?

by the way, there’s alot of “max hit” in it… do you know how i make the normal player defence lower or actually upper the attack rate?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 standard problems - plox help
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

search maxhit, and for gui go to your bin folder and gui will prolly be in there unless your using a fullscreen client that one doesn’t use gui. if it is in bin you will have to find something to decompile it or find a gui from another client. and put it with your other java files.

Read full topic
